DEPTH = 1024;
WIDTH = 16;

ADDRESS_RADIX = DEC;
DATA_RADIX = BIN;

--
CONTENT
BEGIN
0			:	0100000000000100;
1			:	1110000000001110;
2			:	0111000000011100;
3			:	0011100000111000;
4			:	0001110001110000;
5			:	0000111011100000;
6			:	0000001111000000;
7			:	0000001110000000;
8			:	0000001111111111;
9			:	1100001111111111;
10			:	0100000100000000;
11			:	0100001011000000;
12			:	0100010011000000;
13			:	0111100011000000;
14			:	0000000011110000;
15			:	0000000011110000;
--
END;
